claim_evidence: the statistical translation is superior , especially in the presence of speech input and ungrammatical input
evidence: Comparative evaluations with other translation approaches of the Verbmobil prototype system show that the statistical translation is superior , especially in the presence of speech input and ungrammatical input .
text: Comparative evaluations with other translation approaches of the Verbmobil prototype system show that the statistical translation is superior , especially in the presence of speech input and ungrammatical input .
